title: :pushpin: Ally Rules
description: This is a guide to avoid conflicts. If there is any doubt or suggestion contact @Wolfyllo#0992 or @Faby#9535 we are always OPEN to hear them.

fields.name: 1. PK an ally member
fields.value:
1st 5 days kick, ban discord/ts everything
2nd full kick

fields.name: Friendly clans at Subclass/Nobless RB:
fields.value:
- Torment
- Insomnia
- Phoenix

- Threats or offensive texting
- Shitbuffing
- Stealing drops
- Stun
Is treated same as pk and penalty will be applied

fields.name: 2. Insult and offensive behavior
fields.value:
Verbal warning and if you keep it will result in kick discord and clan
Examples of insults:
- Monkey gifs or jokes
- Nigga or N word related
- LGBT + insults

fields.name: 3. To save the leveling spot there must be ALWAYS someone there
fields.value:
If you arrive and there is no one (logout, flu, whatever) spot is FREE
Advice is that If you want to save spot, exp with someone or if you are relogging for frenzy have a camera there. AFK camera does not save a spot
-If someone is stealing your spot and you have proof = kick

fields.name: 4. Field Raidbosses
fields.value:
Whoever arrives first with at least 1destro + sws or bd + 1buffer gets the raid, you can always share drops between partys if agreed
-If a party is trying to steal the boss from you and you have proof = kick

fields.name: 5. Mandatory assistance
fields.value:
Any kind of epic event or to subclass raid boss/barakiel when someone need it in ally
- If you get reported with screenshot of video farming during a event your cp will be penalized

fields.name: 6. Party Leader in a EVENT you are responsible of making sure:
fields.value:
- all pt members are in TS and active
- there is an MA (Main Assist)
- you call 1st/2nd/3rd single ress
- your members knows who to spell force

field.name: 7. FOIs and DRIVERS
field.value: -Notify ALLY if you got DEBUFFED (SILENCE/MEDUSA) or INTERRUPTED (SPECIFY if you have or not STILL FOI so commander doesnt looks like stupid calling for info and can use your foi in case it wasnt interrupted!)
